description: The administrative state of the PTP subsystem has changed.
Enable or disable the Precision Time Protocol on this node.
Note: SHE system will enable/disable the PTP subsystem via a configuration command
in sheSyncMib. This will force an switchover between the system default sync module, which
could use T3 or BITS or syncEthernet as sync sources configured and controled via sheSyncMib
and the PTP sync module configured and controled via this shePtpMib module.
A modification will only be supported if CXU_B3 is used! All other CXU versions are not able to
variables.name: SHE-PTP-MIB::shePtpAdminState

description: This alarm will be activated if the ptp sync module is enabled and no external sync master
was found or connection could not be established or was lost.

Summary.eval: ($v4==5) ? 'PTP synchronization alarm cleared' : 'PTP synchronization alarm detected'

tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD SHE-PTP-MIB::shePtpSynchronizationAlarm SHE-ALARMING-MIB::sheAlarmTimeAndDate t 31536000 SHE-ALARMING-MIB::sheAlarmReportingSource u 9999 SHE-ALARMING-MIB::sheAlarmReportingSourceType i 1 SHE-ALARMING-MIB::sheAlarmSeverity i 2

$SNMPTRAPCMD SHE-PTP-MIB::shePtpSynchronizationAlarm SHE-ALARMING-MIB::sheAlarmTimeAndDate t 31536000 SHE-ALARMING-MIB::sheAlarmReportingSource u 9999 SHE-ALARMING-MIB::sheAlarmReportingSourceType i 1 SHE-ALARMING-MIB::sheAlarmSeverity i 5

description: Indicates the time stamp when the alarm notification was sent.
variables.name: SHE-ALARMING-MIB::sheAlarmTimeAndDate

description: If applicable, indicates which instance of a component is
reporting the alarm. It is interpreted dependent on the
variables.name: SHE-ALARMING-MIB::sheAlarmReportingSource

description: Indicates the type or class of reporting source for the alarm.
Reporting source type determines how sheAlarmReportingSource
is to be interpreted. See sheAlarmReportingSourceType for a
A sheAlarmSeverityProfileEntry can be assigned to each
sheAlarmReportingSourceType within the MIB associated with
variables.name: SHE-ALARMING-MIB::sheAlarmReportingSourceType

description: Values 1..4 indicate that the alarm of the given severity has
been raised, the actual severity used being dependent on the
Value 5 indicates that the alarm has been cleared.
variables.name: SHE-ALARMING-MIB::sheAlarmSeverity

description: 1. If the ptp sync module is enabled and no valid IpHostInterface configuration could be detected.
-> Configure a valid host interface via sheSystemIpHostTable.
2. The used interface was reconfigured during ongoing PTP session.
-> The PTP module must be restarted.

Summary.eval: ($v4==5) ? 'PTP IP host interface alarm cleared' : 'PTP IP host interface alarm detected'
